content: this easy to make textured granny square with a flower motif in the centre is inspired by my other design the sakura face scrubbies the pattern is using front post and back post stitches to create a nice textured look finished size of the square is approx 5 x 5 which can be used to make a big granny square blanket * i used dk yarn but you can use any yarn and use as many colours as you want * us terms used throughout i hope you ll enjoy this little project happy crocheting krisztina
